name: Bag
description: A regular carrying bag, can hold 30kgs.

name: Bandage
description: A bandage used for wrapping wounds. Heals 1d4 +1 Health with successful Medicine roll DS 15.

name: Torch
description: Creates a 4-space radius of no obscurity from light, with an additional 4 spaces of light obscurity.

name: Health Potion
description: Health Potions require an interaction to ingest, or a quick action to administer to a willing creature, and heal 1d6 + 3 Health upon use.

name: Energy Potion
description: Energy Potions require an interaction to ingest, or a quick action to administer to a willing creature, and Regain 1d6 + 3 EP upon use.

name: Bed Roll
description: Regular sleeping roll, provides comfort and warmth.

name: Flint & Steel Fire Starter
description: Flint and steel to be used to create sparks thus starting fires.

name: Grapple Rope
description: 12 metre rope with grapple attachment for use being thrown. Thrown range 8 using Strength to hit.
